Name: condition_team_cross_functional
Description: Ensure the team possesses a diverse set of skills (cross-functional)

Name: condition_scrum_master_experience
Description: The assigned Scrum Master must have sufficient experience

Name: condition_user_story_acceptance
Description: All user stories must meet their acceptance criteria before completion

Name: condition_snapshot_test_status
Description: The development snapshot must pass testing before release

Name: condition_project_on_time
Description: The project must not exceed its planned end date

Name: condition_worker_certified
Description: Critical tasks require workers with certified skills

Name: condition_feature_audience_match
Description: Features must be developed for the project's target audience

Name: condition_backlog_prioritized
Description: The product backlog must be ordered by priority

Name: condition_retrospective_actions
Description: Improvement actions from retrospectives must be documented
